notes: Amplifies any heal sourced from the owner of the item, and any healing they receive. This means it does not amplify heals the owner receives from allies, but it does amplify heals allies receive from the owner.
Amplifies all health regeneration on the owner.
Does not amplify mana or mana regeneration.
abilities.description: Amplifies the wearer's Regeneration, Healing and Lifesteal by 17%.

attrs: Bonus +17% Health regen amplification +17% Lifesteal amplification +17 Attack damage +17% Lifesteal
info: Stacks additively with other sources of lifesteal and with itself.
Cannot lifesteal off of wards, buildings and allied units.
The health regen amplification stacks additively with other sources of health regen amplification.
The lifesteal amplification stacks additively with other sources of lifesteal amplification.
